commenter_a: I think a more interesting question would be, will women cycle differently on other planets? I'm no scientitian, but it seems to me it's a helluva coincidence (that we take for granted) that the female menstrual cycle is in line with the lunar cycle. Our bodies are 2/3rds water and the moon controls the tides. Am I talking out my ass if I suggest maybe the moon can can influence the fluids in our bodies? So on a dfferent planet, with different moons (and presumably after having been there for several generations), would women cycle differently?
